hidSetup.title: Pen Setup
hidSetup.accessoryText: Press and hold the top pen button for 5 seconds to enter pairing mode.
hidSetup.accessoryErrorText: Press and hold the top button for 5 seconds to enter pairing mode.
hidSetup.accessorySuccessText: Pen pairing was successful! Try thes these features later. Click once, Windows Ink Workspace Home. Double-click, Windows Ink Workspace Screen Sketch. Press and hold, Windows Ink Workspace Sticky Notes.
